short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An HNT Wallet in your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Laser is an HNT Wallet in your browser. View your HNT addresses all in one place. 

You can always "view the source" of Laser the way you do any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github: https://github.com/definitelyfriends/laser-wallet
